page.title: 10INTER SCHOOL SPORTS SKEGNESS
page.content: The event we are in is called the {QUADRANGULAR SPORTS.}It is so called because there are four schools competing.Quad means four.The schools are{Wainfleet,County Junior,Seathorne, {Richmond County Primary}.These schools are all around Skegness.There are twelve track events and six field events.Track events are running races and field events are things like jumping and throwing.The Quadrangular sports first started in 1982 at Richmond County Primary.In 1983 it was held at Seathorne School.In 1984 it was held at County Junior.In 1985 it is being held at Richmond School.There is one cup for the over all winers.The sections are under 10's and under 11's.There is a lot of friendly competition for the cup.The event usually takes place in July at the end of the summer term.
